org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowSslErrorHandler
    Deprecated. 
    There is no special shadow implementation for the Handler class. The special handling is all done by ShadowLooper and ShadowMessageQueue. This class has been retained for backward compatibility with the various static method implementations.

    @Deprecated
 @Implements(value=android.os.Handler.class)
public class ShadowHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    Robolectric places posted Runnables into a queue instead of sending them to be handled on a separate thread. Runnables that are scheduled to be executed immediately can be triggered by calling idleMainLooper().

    todo: add utility method to advance time and trigger execution of Runnables scheduled for a time in the future
